Here you can choose your notification se: Here you can choose your notification service, you can use more than one service, but you can also leave all blank, then only the datapoint lastNotification will be filled.
Here you can define the offline times of: Here you can define the offline times of each adapter. If you want to use the data points of the devices (online, available, reachable etc.) directly to determine the status, enter ' 0 '.
Here you can define the offline times of each adapter. If you want to use the data points of the devices (online, available, reachable etc.) directly to determine the status, enter '-1'.
Here you can define the update interval: Here you can define the update interval of the datapoints/lists. For performance reasons, it is not recommended to select a poll value that is too low. Lower than two seconds is not selectable.
